  • Description: PACKAGE WAS UNLOADED AND FOUND TO BE DAMP BY THE SORTER. IN-HOUSE RESPONDER PICKED UP THE PACKAGE AND BROUGHT IT TO THE DMP CAGE FINDING THAT THE CAN WAS DENTED AND HAD FORMED A SMALL CRACK.

item.title: Report X-2025020903
item.description:
Report X-2025020903

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-23T00:59:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-18
  • City: TUKWILA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: INSPECTION WAS DONE OF ONE AIR PACKAGE DUE TO THIS BEING A KNOWN DRY ICE SHIPPER. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED LESS THAN ONE POUND OF DRY ICE PELLETS COOLING STEM CELL RESEARCH MATERIAL. THIS PACKAGE ALSO CONTAINS NON-HAZARDOUS ULINE COLD PACKS. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX.

item.title: Report X-2025020814
item.description:
Report X-2025020814

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-23T00:59:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-11
  • City: TUKWILA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: LEAKING FIBERBOARD BOX WAS DISCOVERED BY A RESPONDER. ALL PPE (GLOVES, GOGGLES, BOOTS, APRON, SILVER LINING) WAS PUT ON AND BOX WAS PLACED INTO A YELLOW TUB/DMP BAG. BOX WAS THEN TRANSFERRED TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. ALL PPE/TUBS WERE THEN DECONTAMINATED AND BOX WAS FURTHER PROCESSED INTO ETT.
